import api from"./api";// Get all skills
export const getSkills=async()=>{const response=await api.get("/skills");return response.data;};// Get skill by ID
export const getSkillById=async id=>{const response=await api.get("/skills/".concat(id));return response.data;};// Create new skill
export const createSkill=async skillData=>{const response=await api.post("/skills",skillData);return response.data;};// Update skill
export const updateSkill=async(id,skillData)=>{const response=await api.put("/skills/".concat(id),skillData);return response.data;};// Delete skill
export const deleteSkill=async id=>{const response=await api.delete("/skills/".concat(id));return response.data;};
